Subject: Cannot login to my account
Message: Hi I've been trying to log into my account for the past 2 hours but keep getting an error message saying invalid credentials. I've tried resetting my password twice but still can't get in. This is urgent as I have a client presentation tomorrow.

Subject: Double charged this month
Message: Hello I noticed I was charged twice on my credit card this month for my subscription. Can you please explain why this happened and issue a refund for the duplicate charge? Invoice numbers are INV-2024-001 and INV-2024-002.

Subject: Platform completely down for our team
Message: URGENT: Our entire 50-person team cannot access the platform. We're getting 500 server errors across all browsers. This is costing us thousands in lost productivity. Need immediate response.

Subject: Request for bulk export feature
Message: Hi there I was wondering if you could add a bulk export feature for our data. Currently we have to export each record individually which takes forever. Would really appreciate this enhancement!

Subject: Slow performance since yesterday
Message: The application has been extremely slow since yesterday afternoon. Pages are taking 30+ seconds to load and sometimes timeout completely. Other users in my organization are experiencing the same issue.

Subject: How to change my email address
Message: I need to update the email address on my account but can't find the option in settings. Could you please guide me through the process or change it for me? New email should be lisa.garcia.new@email.com

Subject: Data export missing last week's records
Message: Hi we ran our weekly data export yesterday but noticed it's missing all records from January 8-14. This is critical for our compliance reporting. Can you investigate and provide the missing data ASAP?

Subject: Billing question about annual discount
Message: I'm interested in switching to annual billing to get the discount mentioned on your website but can't find the option in my account. Can you help me make this change and let me know what the new rate would be?

Subject: Feature request: Dark mode
Message: Hey would it be possible to add a dark mode option to the interface? I work long hours and it would really help reduce eye strain. I know many other users would appreciate this too.

Subject: Security concern: unauthorized access attempt
Message: We received alerts about multiple failed login attempts on our admin account from an unfamiliar IP address. Can you please investigate and confirm our account security? This happened around 3 AM EST today.

Subject: Can't upload files larger than 10MB
Message: I'm trying to upload a 15MB file but keep getting an error saying file too large. Your documentation says 20MB limit so I'm confused. Can you help me figure out what's wrong?

Subject: Request to delete my account
Message: I need to permanently delete my account and all associated data due to company policy changes. Please confirm this is possible and what the process involves.

Subject: Invoice not received for last month
Message: Hi I haven't received my invoice for December yet. Could you please resend it? I need it for expense reporting. My account email is definitely correct.

Subject: API rate limits too restrictive
Message: Our development team is hitting API rate limits constantly which is blocking our integration work. We need higher limits or different pricing tier options. This is impacting our go-live timeline.

Subject: Lost all my saved reports
Message: All my custom reports disappeared from my dashboard overnight. I had about 20 saved reports that took weeks to configure. Please help me recover them or at least explain what happened.

Subject: How to integrate with Slack
Message: I'd like to set up Slack notifications for our team but can't find clear documentation on how to do this. Could you provide step-by-step instructions or point me to the right resources?

Subject: Urgent: Payroll data discrepancy
Message: We discovered a major discrepancy in our payroll export that could affect 200+ employees. The total hours don't match our internal system. Need immediate assistance to resolve before Friday payroll run.

Subject: Password reset not working
Message: I've tried to reset my password multiple times but never receive the reset email. I've checked spam folder and confirmed email address is correct. Can you manually reset it for me?

Subject: Need data retention policy details
Message: Our legal team needs detailed information about your data retention policies and deletion procedures for compliance review. Can you provide official documentation?

Subject: Discount for non-profit organization
Message: We're a registered 501c3 non-profit. Do you offer any discounts for organizations like ours? If so what's the application process?

Subject: System integration failing
Message: Our ERP system integration has been failing for the past 3 days. Error logs show authentication issues but our credentials haven't changed. This is blocking our production workflows.

Subject: HIPAA compliance documentation
Message: We need current HIPAA compliance documentation and security certifications for our vendor assessment process. Can you provide the latest versions?

Subject: Feature request: Mobile app
Message: Any plans for a mobile app? Would be super helpful for our remote team to access the platform on phones and tablets.

Subject: Bulk user management needed
Message: We need to add 100+ new users for our seasonal staff. Is there a way to bulk import users rather than adding them one by one? This is time-sensitive.

Subject: Can't access shared workspace
Message: I was added to a shared workspace yesterday but can't see it in my dashboard. Other team members confirm I was added properly. Can you check my permissions?

Subject: Data visualization not displaying
Message: All my charts and graphs are showing as blank or with error messages since this morning. The data is there but visualizations won't render. Using Chrome browser.

Subject: Refund request for unused subscription
Message: I cancelled my subscription last week but was still charged for this month. Can I get a prorated refund for the unused portion?

Subject: Webhook notifications stopped working
Message: Our webhook endpoints stopped receiving notifications 2 days ago. We verified our endpoint is working and haven't changed any configurations. Can you investigate?

Subject: Two-factor authentication setup
Message: I want to enable two-factor authentication for better security but the option is grayed out in my settings. How can I activate this feature?

Subject: Student bulk enrollment process
Message: We need to enroll 500 students for the new semester. What's the most efficient way to do bulk enrollment with pre-assigned groups and permissions?

Subject: FedRAMP compliance requirements
Message: We're a government agency requiring FedRAMP authorized services. Can you provide information about your FedRAMP authorization status and timeline?

Subject: Logo and branding customization
Message: Is it possible to customize the interface with our company logo and colors? If so what are the requirements and costs involved?

Subject: Performance degradation during peak hours
Message: We're experiencing significant slowdowns between 2-4 PM EST daily. Response times increase from 2 seconds to 15+ seconds. This affects our customer service.

Subject: Gift card integration question
Message: Do you have an API for gift card management? We want to integrate our gift card system with your platform for unified reporting.

Subject: PCI DSS compliance verification
Message: Our security audit requires verification of your PCI DSS compliance. Can you provide current certification documents and security attestations?

Subject: Email template customization
Message: I'd like to customize the email templates for automated notifications. Is this possible and if so where do I find these settings?

Subject: Automated backup verification
Message: How can we verify that our automated backups are working correctly? We need confirmation for our disaster recovery planning.

Subject: Single sign-on integration
Message: We use Okta for SSO across our organization. What's involved in setting up SAML integration with your platform?

Subject: Account suspension notice
Message: I received an email saying my account was suspended but I don't understand why. I haven't violated any terms of service. Can you please investigate and reactivate my account?

Subject: Data processing agreement needed
Message: We require a signed data processing agreement for GDPR compliance. Can you provide your standard DPA template?

Subject: Custom reporting requirements
Message: We need custom reports that aren't available in your standard templates. Do you offer custom report development services?

Subject: Trial extension request
Message: My 30-day trial expires tomorrow but I need more time to evaluate the platform. Is it possible to extend the trial by another week?

Subject: File storage limit increase
Message: We're approaching our file storage limit. What are the options for increasing storage capacity and associated costs?

Subject: Multi-location setup guidance
Message: We have 50 retail locations that need separate but connected instances. What's the best way to structure this in your platform?

Subject: Third-party integrations list
Message: Do you have a comprehensive list of third-party integrations available? Specifically looking for CRM and accounting software connections.

Subject: White-label solution inquiry
Message: We're interested in white-labeling your solution for our clients. Do you offer white-label partnerships and what's involved?

Subject: API documentation outdated
Message: The API documentation appears to be outdated. Several endpoints mentioned don't exist and response formats have changed. Can you update it?

Subject: Volunteer management features
Message: Do you have specific features for volunteer management? We need tracking for volunteer hours and automated scheduling.

Subject: Gradebook integration needed
Message: Can your platform integrate with common gradebook systems like Canvas or Blackboard? This would be essential for our implementation.

Subject: Accessibility compliance (508)
Message: We need to ensure your platform meets Section 508 accessibility requirements. Can you provide a VPAT (Voluntary Product Accessibility Template)?
